message: Starting comprehensive audit of JSON registry operations - searching for all read/write operations to GLOBAL_REGISTRY.json and AGENT_REGISTRY.json
Found orchestrator/registry.py with 2354 lines of registry operations. Now examining real_mcp_server.py to identify all registry read/write locations
Analyzing lifecycle.py, deployment.py, and health_daemon.py for registry operations. Found extensive registry usage across the codebase
Reading state_db.py to catalog all available SQLite functions that could replace JSON registry operations. Found schema with tasks, phases, agents tables

Completed comprehensive audit of JSON registry operations. Found 108 files referencing registries, 80+ write operations, 25+ read operations across 14 core files. Created detailed migration report mapping all operations to SQLite replacements with risk assessment and phased migration strategy.
